replies.body: It's school holidays man, the game is horrible for the next few weeks. Don't play any account you're trying to climb on, have an account you don't care about for holidays. Kids have poor decision making abilities, short tempers, low emotional IQs and poor communication skills. This is in life in general, not just in league. It's a terrible set of traits for any activity that relies heavily on team work and keeping a level head though.
When does the school holidays finish?
Welcome to support life, where yesterday, most players in silver were monkeys, even players on the winning teams. Never seen such low quality play since I started playing league.

> [{quoted}](name=Bookbash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=txJXzRTs,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-06-20T21:54:39.322+0000)

Not just support lyfe, i play mid/top too, and its always the same, its very feelsbadman
Yeah I have more fun playing arams these days. Have to /fullmute all on summoners rift.
I should start screen shotting mine too :/

> [{quoted}](name=talknerdytome,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=txJXzRTs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-20T19:15:50.823+0000)
>
> I should start screen shotting mine too :/

If we screenshot enough without naming and shaming, maybe riot will look at our match history and ban those people who are inting, on top of the reports we submit :^)

I'm sorry, but you should never play ranked games.
If you do, you will start seeing people leave.
This couldn't possibly be the worst examples you could find. Those scores are simply people losing lane.

> [{quoted}](name=Orange Caramel,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=txJXzRTs,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-06-21T13:35:06.898+0000)
>
> I'm sorry, but you should never play ranked games.
> If you do, you will start seeing people leave.
> This couldn't possibly be the worst examples you could find. Those scores are simply people losing lane.

The Camille, lost lane 0/7 within 10 mins, then built 5 tears, then sold those for tank items and continued to int
The Anivia, won lane but somehow still inted, then flamed me for letting her die while saving my adc who was actually ahead and did dmg to the enemies
The Ahri flamed me from minute one for picking Ziggs support, while Varus and i completely obliterated bot lane in 15 mins, i think we took tower 9 mins in, then proceeded to start getting 1 hit by the overfed Jax and Syndra
The Fio claimed 'she was a dia smurf' scores would say otherwise, and we all called her out on it, turns out the riven was also a dia smurf, and actual dia smurf :/ she stood no chance lmao

this has been my ranked games for the last 4 weeks give or take, very rarely am i the reason we lose
for context, this wasn't a whine post, i was actually just trying to see if anyone else was experiencing the same crap, and also trying to give riot a reason to start dropping bans without naming/shaming

That sounds perfectly normal to me in silver.
I have a silver 5 account on which I have people trash talk and afk starting from the cha,p select screen. It happens almost every single game.
Just get a higher rank. I'd say at least mid gold.

> [{quoted}](name=Orange Caramel,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=txJXzRTs,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2018-06-23T08:55:20.486+0000)
>
> That sounds perfectly normal to me in silver.
> I have a silver 5 account on which I have people trash talk and afk starting from the cha,p select screen. It happens almost every single game.
> Just get a higher rank. I'd say at least mid gold.

Sadly, climbing is basically impossible when i get teams like that (or when my net decides to die on its ass for a week :/ )

I'm at the point in my league career where i play for first win quest then give up completely until it resets
